html:
Entry to the desert forbidden
Established by the forest people
Entry strictly forbidden
Under threat of penalty
We trained staff
Built institutions
We’ll throw anyone there
Who wants to enter the desert
We are majority
And everyone should live in a forest
If you ask why
I’ll say: it’s simply chauvinism
Entry to the desert forbidden
In liberal democracy
People on mandate decided
The entry will be forbidden
title: Desert
